long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Add Emojis Anywhere, Anytime! 😀
Say goodbye to the hassle of copying and pasting emojis! 🎉
Emoji Autocomplete brings you the power of emoji autocompletion — just like in Slack, Discord, GitHub, and more — right into your browser for use on any website.
Whether you're typing an email, chatting on social media, or leaving comments on forums, now you can easily insert emojis by simply typing : followed by a word, like :laughing or :heart. A pop-up will instantly show matching emoji suggestions, letting you quickly pick the perfect one for your message.

❤️ Top Features ❤️

✓ Universal compatibility: Works seamlessly across all websites, including Twitter, Reddit, Gmail, Facebook, LinkedIn, and more.
✓ Customizable control: You decide which websites will use emoji autocomplete—turn it on or off for specific sites with ease.
✓ Effortless typing: Simply type : followed by a keyword, and you’ll get a list of relevant emojis to choose from. Make your messages more engaging in seconds!
✓ Time-saving tool: Skip the need to search for emojis or copy-paste from other sources. With Emoji Autocomplete, your favorite emojis are always at your fingertips.
✓ Lightweight and fast: The extension is designed to be lightweight, ensuring it doesn't slow down your browsing experience.

🤔 Why Choose Emoji Autocomplete? 🤔 

✓ Save time: Whether you’re writing emails, comments, or social media posts, typing emojis with autocompletion speeds up your workflow.
✓ More fun: Make your online conversations more expressive, colorful, and fun by adding emojis effortlessly.
✓ User-friendly: No complicated setup. Just install, and you’re ready to use emoji shortcuts anywhere.
✓ Affordable: A small, one-time fee (enough for a coffee!) with a personal touch—reach out for a discount and get started without breaking the bank.

🏁 How It Works 🏁 

Simply start typing a colon (:) followed by a few letters, like :sun, and watch as a pop-up of matching emojis appears. This works on any website and integrates seamlessly with your typing flow.
